name: fhc-api
description: Typescript version of Freehealth Connector standalone API client

scripts.gen: java -classpath swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.SwaggerCodegen generate -i https://fhcacc.icure.cloud/v2/api-docs -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=fhc -o ./
scripts.genloc: java -classpath swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.SwaggerCodegen generate -i http://127.0.0.1:8090/v2/api-docs -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=fhc -o ./

author: Taktik sa
